The cheese product has never been in our kitchen. Smoked suluguni can be different (which I tried to explain to you), but this does not mean that it was bought in Silpo. You said that you were in Georgia and tasted cheese there, I replied that I was in Georgia too (I have not lived there for 5 years) and you know that the cheese is completely different there, like all products, however. There are many factors that affect the taste. And she explained that they did not bring cheese to us from Georgia (can you imagine its cost?) And the production is in Ukraine. And she offered not to pay for cutting cheese if you did not like it. You said that everything is fine. Judging by your text, this is not so. 096-910-10-10 please dial.
